game.description: Help the villagers of Greenfield! There have been reports of a dangerous monster lurking in the forest. Your quest is to defeat the monster and bring peace back to the village.

tasks.description: Gather information from the villagers about the monster's whereabouts
Search the forest for tracks and clues to locate the monster
Prepare for battle by acquiring weapons and armor
tasks.objective: Purchase a sword and a shield
Defeat the monster in a battle

game.title: The Monster of Greenfield
